title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The ornate cup gleams with a sense of ancient elegance, crafted from polished metal adorned with intricate designs. Its deep, dark interior hints at mystery, while the shining gold rim adds a touch of luxury. The cup is embellished with sparkling blue gemstones, each cut with precision, reflecting light in mesmerizing patterns. This item symbolizes victory and reward, often pursued by adventurers in their quests. Whether used as a decorative piece or as a trophy representing triumph, it carries an aura of prestige. Collectors value it not just for its beauty, but for the stories and achievements it embodies.
